overview: Thel Malayalam movie written and directed by Shafi SS Hussain. The movie features Dayana Hameed as the lead character with Nandhu Anand, Sajan Palluruthy, Saju Navodaya, and Kottayam Ramesh. Produced by Jasim S under the banner of Thanveer Creations, P Padmakumar, Jayakrishnan K, and Shafeeq are the co-producers of the movie.
title: Thel
